content.rendered:
About Us

We’re dedicated to the
success of your business.

Get more than just the best rates.

Started by two business owners who wanted a better way to take payments, Dynamic Merchant Solutions is about more than just the best rates. From our customer service, fast delivery of funds, and yes, guaranteed low rates, we strive to be the only processor you’ll ever need.

Support

As a Dynamic Merchant Solutions customer, you will always receive the support you need. From terminal issues to questions about your bill, someone will be there to answer your call 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Get Started Now
View Our Services

Put it in Writing

Your trust is important to us and that’s why Dynamic Merchant Solutions provides your custom price quote in writing. We clearly identify the charges and terms of our agreement, and look forward to making you a valued customer.

Get Started Now
View Our Services

Communication

The payment processing industry constantly evolves, with new technologies and solutions added almost every day. To keep you up to date, Dynamic Merchant Solutions will always notify you of any changes that affect your account. Additionally, your account manager is always available to answer any questions you may have.

Get Started Now
View Our Services
01 04

Best Merchant Services
Company In Los Angeles.

Our banking and technology partners

Our Services

Get the payment solutions that are best for your business.

EMV

Get enhanced fraud protection with EMV chip technology by upgrading your credit card machines.

Read More

Gift Cards

Acquire new customers with a customizable gift card program!

Read More

POS

Accept electronic payments instantly and securely with our best-in-class point of sale systems.

Read More

Apple Pay

Accept secure, contactless payments from Apple users in stores, on websites, and in apps.

Read More

Mobile Processing

Accept payments from anywhere using your iPhone or Android mobile device.

Read More

Ordering App

Get your own custom-branded mobile app and start taking orders directly from your customers.
Read More

Reporting

Access your processing statements and detailed transactional reporting without having to buy expensive software.

Read More

Hardware

Accept all forms of payments with credit card terminals, POS systems, and mobile swipers.

Read More

Shopping Cart

Create your own e-commerce website or integrate with an existing online ordering system.

Read More

Transform your idea into an app with our experts.

Let our experts create a mobile app specifically for your business and start selling directly to your customers.

Get started today and give your
business a boost

Free Quote
Contact Sales
No application or setup fees  | No hidden fees  |  24/7 customer service
